alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 01 at 1:03PM EDT until October 01 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern New Haven County. In New York, Northwest Suffolk and Northern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 8.7 FT, MODERATE 10.2 FT, MAJOR 11.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.4 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 3.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/01 PM 9.2/ 9.7 1.9/ 2.3 0.8/ 1.3 0 MINOR 02/02 AM 8.2/ 8.7 0.9/ 1.4 0.7/ 1.1 0 NONE 02/02 PM 8.7/ 9.2 1.4/ 1.9 0.5/ 1.0 0 NONE 03/03 AM 7.7/ 8.2 0.4/ 0.9 0.6/ 1.1 0 NONE 03/03 PM 8.3/ 8.8 1.0/ 1.5 0.5/ 1.0 0 NONE NEW HAVEN HARBOR AT NEW HAVEN CT MLLW CATEGORIES -
